title: my silver border
body: i got my silver summoners icon but i didnt get my border. is that normal?

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, we haven't started rolling out ranked rewards just yet. Give us some time and we'll get those out to you. ^.^
I'm sorry the reason i didn't have the border was because i only played flex. i think that was why my border didn't show because once i played a normal game my border showed. Thanks.
